content.p: Zero Carbon Cluster We draw on expertise across the university to accelerate the pace of change. Our incredible breadth of zero carbon research expertise allows us to move from ideas to action at scale and at pace. Explore our faculties, institutes and research groups – and discover how we are consolidating the East Midlands’ position as a world leader in the development and deployment of innovation in green industries. Contact us at zerocarboncluster@nottingham.ac.uk
